description: Shale gray tactical field pants in durable nylon

core:description.text: Durable shale gray tactical field pants constructed from ripstop nylon for maximum performance in demanding environments. Features reinforced knees, multiple cargo pockets with secure closures, and articulated knees for unrestricted movement. The water-resistant fabric dries quickly while the adjustable waist with belt loops ensures a secure fit. Built for reliability in field operations, outdoor activities, or urban tactical scenarios.
